metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15690 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
heap buffer overflow in libvncclient/cursor.c related to large cursor sizes when connected to a malicious server

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15690` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvncclient1 - 0.9.13+dfsg-1
libvncserver1 - 0.9.13+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.13+dfsg-1').
x11vnc package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
